mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Lovell, R. C. M. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lovell, R. C. M.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov FH Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Aug 24th 1861. By Telegraph from Pomeroy 1861. A german artillery company six 6 of whom served six 6 years with Genl Seigil [Franz Sigel] in the artillery offers to join our Regiment will you accept them answer RCM Lovell 26 H 115&134 Coll
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lovell, R. C. M.
Pomeroy, Ohio
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
